title: How do I install third-party applications to the microSD card?
answer:
By default, third-party applications are installed to your phone's internal storage. The default installation location cannot be changed. However, you can move third-party applications to the microSD card.

Go to the Settings screen, select Manage apps, touch the application you want to move, and then select Move to SD card.

Some applications may not be able to be moved to the microSD card.

After you move an application to the microSD card and you uninstall, remove or format the microSD card, the application will no longer be available.




Note: The figure is for your reference only. Actual screens may vary.
